details: In the LG F4DV910H2 washing machine, possibly all washers in the F4DV series, a data processing vulnerability exists in the WiFi card and/or software that can be attacked via simply sending a large amount of WiFi network traffic on the WiFi network the washer is attached to, resulting in the washer WiFi (software and/or hardware) crashing, and the washer stops responding to the network.
summary: data processing in LG F4DV910H2 version possibly all washers in the F4DV series
